mapper.update: update honor set honorpoint=honorpoint+1 where honor_seq = #{honor_seq}
update honor set honorpoint=honorpoint-1 where honor_seq = #{honor_seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from writer_image_up where substr(img_sysdate, 4,2)='01' order by viewcount desc) where rownum<=3
select * from (select * from writer_image_up where substr(img_sysdate, 4,2)='01' order by downcount desc) where rownum<=3
select * from (select * from writer_image_up where substr(img_sysdate, 4,2)='01' order by img_like desc) where rownum<=3
select count(*) from honor where img_seq = #{img_seq}
select * from (select * from member order by likepoint desc) where admin='N' and rownum<=3
select * from (select * from writer_image_up where nickname=#{nickname} order by downcount+img_like desc) where rownum<=3
select * from (select member.*, row_number() over(order by likepoint desc) as rown from member) where rown=1
select * from (select member.*, row_number() over(order by likepoint desc) as rown from member) where rown=2
select * from (select member.*, row_number() over(order by likepoint desc) as rown from member) where rown=3
